name: The arrival (itch) (Antoni Ciscar)
description:
WELCOME TO THE ARRIVAL!

What is this?

A short puzzle game where you teleport between various points until you reach your final destination.

Touch these points to teleport!

                                                    

What is your goal?

Collect the keys distributed throughout the rooms and reach the end.

Keys like this one!

               

How do I move the character?

Press the arrow keys to move or to interact with the environment.

Here is an example of what you will find in the game, have fun!
